name: Justiciar

skills.name: Hold the Line
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Increases this Champion's DEF by 3% (up to 10 times in one round).
Damage based on: [ATK] [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%

skills.name: Contemptuous Blow
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff on the target for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [DEF] [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10'
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10
Lvl. 7 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Comeback
skills.raw_description: When this Champion is hit with a critical hit, counterattacks using their default skill and decreases the buffs duration on the target by 1 turn.
